3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to Breckenridge Estates on Linda Vista, where charming flagstone walkway leads to a gated, verdant entryway filled with flowering foliage and fruit trees. Inside, marvel at the home's architectural details; vaulted ceilings, arched doorways and artwork niches in a fashionable neutral palette. Multiple indoor entertaining areas include a living room, dining room, family room and breakfast nook. Adding an air of sophistication are the Java-colored Pergo floors that are durable and require little maintenance. Prepare gourmet meals in this updated kitchen with quartz countertops and stainless appliances. This Richmond American built two-story home offers four bedrooms, one located conveniently downstairs next to a full bathroom. The primary suite offers a luxurious bathtub, seated make-up station and cedar flooring in the walk-in closet. Impress your guests with a relaxing and playful outdoor retreat with multiple seating areas to accommodate a wide circle of friend, gorgeous paver tile patio and a bocce ball court. Freshly painted inside and out, this home also offers a three-car garage and owned solar system. Located near Las Flores Community Center, Alston Park and the Napa Valley Vine Trail. Living in this home will be like being on vacation in your own community.
Confidential Remarks: PLEASE include signed index page of Disclosures if/when writing an offer. Pre-Escrow opened with Placer Title Co. - Leslie Tschida. DISCLOSURES LINK: https://app.disclosures.io/link/4118-Linda-Vista-Avenue-wrlphonn
Directions to Property: Drycreek to Trower to Linda Vista

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: A charming single-story home tucked away on a private lane, providing peace and privacy amidst the beauty of Napa Valley. What more could you ask for? Here sits your perfect 3-2 in the highly sought after North Napa neighborhood. This cozy retreat spans 1580 sq ft. As you walk in, the living features a vaulted ceiling and gas fireplace offering a warm and inviting atmosphere. The primary bedroom includes a walk-in closet and access to the rear deck. Enjoy the California sunshine on the outdoor deck and stone patio year-round. Did I mention 2424 Trower Ct also has newer HVAC, electrical panel, water heater, and water filtration system? Recently completed roof and pest work. Waiting for the right owner to put their personal flare into this lovely Napa hideaway!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Nestled on a quaint street, this meticulously updated single-story home exudes charm from the moment you lay eyes on its inviting exterior. With a striking tile roof and recently painted facade, the curb appeal is undeniable, drawing you in with its timeless elegance. A welcoming entrance adorned with lush landscaping sets the tone for what lies beyond. Stepping inside, the light-filled interior greets you with warmth and sophistication, thanks to the dual-paned windows that flood the space with natural light. The seamless flow from room to room creates an atmosphere of effortless comfort, perfect for both relaxation and entertaining. As you make your way to the rear of the home, a new back patio awaits, offering a serene retreat for al fresco dining or simply unwinding amidst the tranquil surroundings. The beautiful yard boasts flourishing fruit trees and a newer fence for added privacy, providing a picturesque backdrop for outdoor gatherings. Completing this oasis is a retractable awning, offering shade on sunny days while enhancing the outdoor living experience. With every detail carefully curated and thoughtfully executed, this home embodies modern luxury and timeless appeal, inviting you to indulge in a life of comfort and style.
Confidential Remarks: Absolutely must schedule 24 hour in advance. Seller has a small dog and she will take with her for the showing. Text Listing agent to schedule. All showings after 11 am. Disclosures and reports https://app.disclosures.io/link/4027-Lloyd-Drive-liq1jrte

Public Remarks: This home is located in the most coveted neighborhood in North Napa. Upgraded gourmet kitchen with a Viking gas 6 top stove/oven. Wood floors throughout, freshly painted interior, fireplace with a formal living room, great room and dining room. The backyard landscape was designed to provide privacy with mature trees and fencing. Two car garage with custom built cabinets, sealed floors. Walk across the street to Alston Park where dogs can run off leash. Close to town, great location for jogging or cycling. Move in ready. The home has Solar that is leased, will transfer with ownership.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This single-level home is perfect for modern living, offering a spacious and open layout designed for entertaining and relaxing. With 3 beds and 2 baths, there is plenty of space for a family or guests, and the high ceilings and natural light create a bright and inviting atmosphere. The formal living room with dining area is ideal for hosting dinner parties, while the family room with fireplace and open kitchen combo provides a comfortable space for everyday living. The large primary bedroom features two closets, including a walk-in, and a spacious bathroom with a tub, shower, and double vanity. The finished garage with epoxy floors provides ample storage space, while the low maintenance backyard is fully landscaped and hardscaped for easy upkeep. The built-in Sonos sound system inside and out is perfect for entertaining guests or enjoying music while you relax or grill. Located in a highly desirable North Napa neighborhood, this home is close to top-rated schools, Alston Park, a 157-ac outdoor space with hiking trails and rolling hills, Osprey, a local's favorite seafood market, Il Posto restaurant, Ranch market, a community grocery store, as well as some of the best wineries and restaurants up valley.
Confidential Remarks: Fantastic home in fabulous location. Seller is relocating. Full disclosure package available now (Roof report will be uploaded on 2.23.23) including SPQ, TDS, NHD, Prelim, General home, Pest, and Roof inspection reports. A/C is older but in good working condition. Escrow pre-opened with Angie Pinckney with ORTC in Napa. For questions related to property or offers, please call/text Listing Agent Florence @707-205-0136. Please send your offer to Florence@lagence-napavalley.com. Smoker and Grill (hooked up to the gas line) convey. Sonos sound system conveys. Outdoor furniture (swing, 2 lounge chaises), 3 wine fridges + regular fridge in garage, and TV in the living room available for sale separately. https://app.disclosures.io/link/87-Winedale-Lane-z71qfaay
Directions to Property: Please use GPS

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: North Napa, well maintained home in Rancho Las Flores neighborhood best known for it's popular public pickleball/tennis courts and Las Flores Community Center. Open living space to the spacious kitchen which looks out to the backyard ready for your entertaining. New flooring in the downstairs living space and a spacious primary bedroom suite upstairs are highlights you will want to see for yourself. An opportunity to own a home on a corner lot in this welcoming neighborhood and be centrally located with close proximity to Hwy 29 and shopping including walking distance to Il Posto, Osprey and Ranch Market.
Confidential Remarks: Disclosures available at https://app.disclosures.io/link/4446-Stillson-Street-ixqdr05g. Please sign off on the disclosure package and submit with an offer. Please use Tiffany Diede with Old Republic Title Company for escrow in offer.
Directions to Property: Hwy 29, exit W on Wine Country Ave., left on Maher

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Charming Napa home on a lovely block in the popular Northwood subdivision with delightful gardens in front and back. Observe the butterflies, wave to your neighbors, and watch the world go by from your elevated front porch. Interior has wood floors, freshly painted interior, formal living and dining room with large slider and picture windows on either side giving the impression of a wall of glass to the backyard. Cozy family room open to the kitchen with dining counter and built in desk/hobby area. Spacious galley kitchen with large windows, gas cooktop, refrigerator, and dishwasher. Primary bedroom has a built-in custom wood dresser with beautiful top to display all of your treasures. Backyard is a private oasis with mature trees, including a persimmon, a dining deck and a sun bathing deck, and a lawn. Stay toasty warm and cool in the summer with the Central Heat & Air and dual pane windows. Bonus room in garage makes a perfect home office! 1,420 Square feet! Interior laundry room with washer & dryer. Previously owned by beloved Napa Valley teachers, this home is ready for it's next owners to enjoy! Convenient location only 2 blocks to Northwood Elementary or Redwood Middle School
Confidential Remarks: Text agent to show. Property had a $18k pest bid including front deck (back deck was excluded - also in poor condition), roof eaves, and primary bath floor. Bid for new roof approx $15,000.
Directions to Property: From Redwood Road go north on Dover past Essex Str

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This is a freshly painted and well cared for North Napa home. Napa's favorite floor plan with high ceilings and multiple spaces for entertaining friends and family. The backyard is a haven of low-maintenance bliss, providing an ideal setting for sizzling barbeques and lively games of corn hole. Embrace the outdoors in this private oasis without the worry of extensive upkeep. You'll find parks, trails, and bike paths at your doorstep, beckoning you to explore the beauty of Napa's landscape. For your furry friend, a dog park awaits to provide joy and companionship. Hot air balloons painting the sky remind you that you're living in a place where every day is a celebration. It has parking for toys, RV, or a boat. There is also a solar power system. Truly a great place to call home.
Confidential Remarks: Showings should be easy Dogs on property call agent to remove.
Directions to Property: Dry Creek to Wine Country

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Daisy Finazzo - Agt: 925-768-0209 - Trio at Napa is a trendy collection of new homes, both single and two stories, designed in the modern farmhouse style and located in a well-established neighborhood. These stunning new homes boast open floorplans with 3-4 bedrooms, 2-3.5 bathrooms, and up to 3,100 sq. ft. of living space. With limited home sites available, an opportunity to own in this quaint community will not last! Introducing our beautiful Haystacks.  This charming two-story feels bright and airy with vaulted ceilings in the open-concept kitchen, dining, and great room as well as a private entrance to the attached ADU.  The extra large covered patio provides the perfect place to enjoy Napa weather and bring the outdoors in. Solar is included with the purchase.  NO HOA!TRIO is CLOSED on Wednesday and Thursday.

The Buyers Realtor/Broker MUST BE PRESENT at the time of registration, as well as the time of contract to receive any referral compensation.   Prices are subject to change without notice. The home is under construction. Pictures are of rendering and for reference only.  No Investors! Homeowner occupied only.  Please check in our sales office located at 2012 Wine Country Avenue Trio's phone number is 707-690-9569
Directions to Property: From CA-29 N turn Right on Linda Vista Ave

Public Remarks: Discover this exquisite Napa home nestled in a highly sought-after neighborhood, offering both privacy and a family-friendly atmosphere. Homes of this caliber within such a desirable locale are truly a rare find. Large one-story home with approximately 2154 square feet and vaulted ceilings plus 2.5 bathrooms. Spacious kitchen with updated countertops. New engineered hardwood floor throughout the home. Home exterior and interior was freshly painted. New hvac (ac, heater, ductworks). The backyard is adjacent to other properties that are on large lots so there is privacy. Backyard is newly renovated and low maintenance, perfect for entertaining. Conveniently near wineries, downtown, shopping, and restaurants. Also close to the Napa vine trail and hiking trails in Alston Park. Don't wait, come see this home today!
Showing Instruction: Call Appointment Center 800-746-9464 showings@showingtime.com or you can use the showingtime app
